query:
SELECT m.id, m.outbound_ip
            FROM messages m
            WHERE (
                (m.status = 'held' OR m.status = 'reattempt')
                AND now() > m.retry_after AND m.attempts < m.max_attempts
              ) OR (
                (m.status = 'accepted' OR m.status = 'processing')
                AND now() > m.updated_at + '2 minutes'
              )
